1: <pb/><t>¡Chiwila'</t> <t>chi sibalaj utz</t> <t>xukuje' je'lic</t> <t>chi ri achalaxic quejeki' junam!</t>
2: <t>Je jas ri utzalaj c'oc'al</t> <t>ri cäbelel pa qui jolom</t> <t>ri e cojol tak tabal tok'ob coc'ow</t> <t>puwi' ri quismachi'</t> <t>cäkaj c'ä chukul ri catz'iak.</t>
3: <t>Cäjunamataj</t> <t>ruc' ri u räxk'ab ri juyub Hermon,</t> <t>ri cäkaj paquiwi' tak ri juyub aj Sion.</t> <t>Chila' c'u cutak wi</t> <t>ri Ajawaxel ri tewichibal</t> <t>re jun c'aslemal ri man c'o ta u q'uisic.</t>
